StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCounselingRecords]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT C.ID, C.TrainingFileID, C.RecordDate, C.Subject, C.Remarks, C.NCOICSignatureID, U1.FirstName SNCOICFirstName, U1.MiddleName SNCOICMiddleName, U1.LastName SNCOICLastName, C.RecruiterSignatureID, U2.FirstName RecruiterFirstName, U2.MiddleName RecruiterMiddleName, U2.LastName RecruiterLastName FROM USMC.Counseling C LEFT OUTER JOIN [usmc].[vwMcrissUserMgmtUser] AS U1 ON U1.UserID = C.NCOICSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN [usmc].[vwMcrissUserMgmtUser] AS U2 ON U2.UserID = C.RecruiterSignatureID WHERE TrainingFileID = @TrainingFileId
END
